short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Handcrafted Mixed Media, Silver and Copper Contemporary Art Jewellery

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brighten your day with a 'Fusion of Colour' with Art Jewellery by Crystal Clarke.
Collectable Art Jewellery to Wear, Love and Treasure Forever.

Crystal Clarke Jewellery Artist.
Handcrafted Mixed Media, Silver and Copper Contemporary Art Jewellery.

Jewellery is fully hallmarked including Crystals personal makers mark (CC), this simply stands for Crystal Clarke. Hallmarking is carried out by The Birmingham Assay Office.
